Name: Caf√© Goldmund
Review Text:
An awesome  cozy restaurant. With a large terrace for sunny days.
The inside is also beautiful with great atmosphere.
The food is amazing and unique, never tasted anything similar in any other restaurants in the area. Highly recommended!!

Name: Caf√© Goldmund
Review Text: Good food, really enjoyed smashed potatoes with mushroom. Lamb meat was ok, but a bit veined, so it took some time to chew it. Desert is tasty too. Cozy atmosphere, clean toilets, good service.

Name: Caf√© Goldmund
Review Text: Indoor and outdoor seating. Lovley terrace on the water. Good sized menu and decent portions. Food is good and waiting staff are very friendly. Recommended 🙂

Review Text: Absolutely a must if you live nearby! This cafe offers haute cuisine experience for a price of a next door canteen. The food is interesting and delicious, with a variety of vegan options that sound and taste mouth-watering even for …

Name: Caf√© Goldmund
Review Text: Food is absolutely amazing. The combination with the chilled out cafe vibe and affordable but great dishes is a win-win.

Name: Caf√© Goldmund
Review Text:
Amazing ambiance and food, for a cheap price !
Burgers and daily raviolis were delicious and fulfilling :)
This is a good place to stay and have a drink with friends. Great balance between bar and restaurant. Definitely recommended!

Name: Caf√© Goldmund
Review Text: Very relaxed service, no stress, I liked the menu options and there is a good price / quality. We arrived a bit before the curfew time, and could just order and enjoy our drink on the terrace till 20:00, without any hassle or stress.
